page.title: 05 Employment
page.content: Wickford is not a major employer.The industries are concentrated on the Shotgate industrial estate to the east of the town centre,with very few elswhere.The town centre,how ever presents many opportunities in the retail trade,office work and services. A significant number of people are self employed craftsman.Many people find work outside Wickford.London and Basildon especially are major employers.In a class survey,the following figures were obtained: Sample-Parents and siblings in work 15 work in Wickford,12 in Basildon,14 in London,4 in Southend,3 in Rochford, 3 in Chelmsford,2 in Billericay,1 in Rayleigh.In these times of high un- employment,Wickford is below the national average and below the average for S.E.England.
